poke_body.name: Power Gene
poke_body.effect: As long as Nidoking is in play, your attacks by Nidoran Female, Nidorina, Nidoqueen, Nidoran Male, and Nidorino do 10 more damage to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Earth Poison
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Bound Crush
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack does 60 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Nidoking can’t use Bound Crush during your next turn.
